hidden.title: The Bribe
hidden.description: If exactly 1 player votes Yes, you gain 20 Influence. They lose 20 Money.

hidden.title: The Bribe
hidden.description: If exactly 1 player votes Yes, you gain 20 Money. They lose 20 People.

hidden.title: The Bribe
hidden.description: If exactly 1 player votes Yes, you gain 20 Influence. They lose 20 People.

hidden.title: The Great Betrayal
hidden.description: If all players vote No, they each lose 10 Money, and you receive 30 Influence.

hidden.title: The Great Betrayal
hidden.description: If all players vote No, they each lose 10 People, and you receive 30 Influence.

hidden.title: The Great Betrayal
hidden.description: If all players vote No, they each lose 10 People, and you receive 30 Influence.

hidden.title: The Great Betrayal
hidden.description: If all players vote No, they each lose 10 Money, and you receive 30.

hidden.title: Power Surge
hidden.description: If even one player votes Yes, gain 25 Influence. All Yes voters lose 10 People.

hidden.title: Money Surge
hidden.description: If even one player votes Yes, gain 25 Money. All Yes voters lose 10 People.

hidden.title: Blood Pact
hidden.description: If 2 players vote Yes, they each gain 10 people, and you gain 20 influence.

hidden.title: Blood Pact
hidden.description: If all players vote Yes, they each gain 10 money, and you gain 10 people.

hidden.title: Power Surge
hidden.description: If even one player votes Yes, gain 25 Influence. All Yes voters lose 10 People.

hidden.title: Blood Pact
hidden.description: If 2 players vote Yes, they each gain 10 influence, and you gain 20 money.
